column4:
Test: Empty input returns '0000'

Comments: Ensures that the function handles an empty string correctly.

Test: Single letter input returns letter + 3 zeros
Comments:Tests padding for single-letter input.

Test: Common name 'Raghav' returns 'R210'
Comments: Ensures correct consonant and vowel mapping.

Test: Case-insensitive comparison
Comments: Confirms that Soundex is case-insensitive.

Test: Special characters are ignored in Soundex
Comments:Special characters are ignored.

Test: Spaces are ignored in multi-word names
Comments:Spaces are ignored in Soundex code.

Test: Spaces are ignored in multi-word names
Comments:Confirms correct handling of multi-word names.

Test: Special characters and digits are ignored
Comments:Ensures digits and special characters are ignored.

Test: Short name 'Avi' returns 'A100'
Comments:Tests padding to 4 characters for short names.

Test: Name with all same consonants 'Shashank'
Comments:Ensures handling of repeated consonants.

Test: Hyphens are ignored in names
Comments:Hyphens are ignored in Soundex code.

Test: Numbers are ignored in name
Comments:Tests that numbers are ignored when generating Soundex.

Test: Case-insensitive with special characters
Comments:Confirms case insensitivity and ignores special characters.
